titleStmt.title: The threefold state of man vpon earth conteyning [brace] the glorie of his Creation, the miserie of his Fall, and the sweete mysterie of his reparation : discussed in three seuerall sermons at the Court / by Christopher Hampton ...
titleStmt.author: Hampton, Christopher, 1552-1625.
